sample_queries: What is our vacation policy for new employees?
How do I submit an expense report?
What are the legal implications of terminating an employee for poor performance?
Can we invest company funds in cryptocurrency?
What is the process for requesting parental leave?
Should I fire someone for this policy violation?
What are our compliance requirements under GDPR?
How does our health insurance coverage work?
What is the approval process for hiring a new contractor?
Can I get legal advice on this discrimination complaint?

region_comparison.description: Testing if retrieval quality differs between regions

department_comparison.description: Testing if technical docs bias toward engineering queries

primary_use_cases: Compliance document retrieval for legal team
out_of_scope_uses: Making hiring/firing decisions without human review

sample_governance_review.description: Upgrade from GPT-3.5 to GPT-4 for improved accuracy
sample_governance_review.impact_assessment: Expected 15% improvement in answer quality, no change to latency

sample_incidents.description: 20% quality disparity detected between North America and Asia-Pacific regions
System timed out on complex multi-part query
System generated factually incorrect policy information

metadata.purpose: Example data for AI governance demonstrations
